nodes.text: This male individual was the father of Imperial moff Haveland, who acted as the governor of the Esaga sector. At some point, Haveland's father had been the governor of the Esaga sector, and during this time Captain Lochry had served in the sector.

Haveland's father was first mentioned in Timothy Zahn's 2019 novel Thrawn: Treason, the third installment of the Star Wars: Thrawn series. In the passage that Haveland's father is mentioned, Haveland is mistakenly referred to as Havelock. This mistake is corrected in the audiobook (02:38 of chapter 17c).
